snippet: Technology shares were especially hard hit as the major indexes had their worst week since May 2012. The Standard and Poor’s 500-stock index fell 1.2 percent
abstract: Wall Street investors get steady, moderate decline that leaves market with its worst weekly performance since May 2012.
lead_paragraph: Technology shares were especially hard hit as the major indexes had their worst week since May 2012. The Standard and Poor’s 500-stock index fell 1.2 percent

headline.main: Up-and-Down Week Ends for Market With Another Loss
headline.print_headline: Instead of Tumbling, Market Merely Slides Downward
